name: One More Roll
description: Influenced by games like Super Monkey Ball & Marble blast comes One More Roll. A new take on the classic ball rolling genre. With a movement system that rewards skilled play while still being enjoyable for more casual players. Featuring 75 levels & 6 unique enviroments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2410M @ 2.30GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Lowest settings are required to have decent FPS (30-60).
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M @ 2.50GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon R7-260X DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 1 GB available space
